name: Light of the World
description:
STORY
Your enemy dwells in the darkness, waiting to consume you. But do not have fear, for LIGHT will have power over the darkness. Stand in the light and take it with you to keep the enemy away.

GAMEPLAY
- Don't stay in the darkness for too long
- Throw & Recall your shield to light torches and solve puzzles

CONTROLS
Move: A/D, Left/Right Arrow Keys, D-PAD, Left J-Stick
Jump: Space, W, Z, Up Key, South Button
Throw/Recall: Left Mouse, X, West Button

CREDITS
Nelson L: Lead Programmer
Michael P: Lead Designer
